s: I started using Inlifay Kojic Acid Soap in January 2024. I decided to wait a few months to see how it works before doing a Review. I have dark marks on my chin and notice they are clearing up. I only use the soap once a day, 4 to 5 times a week, and leave it on my skin for a minute or two. If you deal with hyperpigmentation due to hirsutism, I highly recommend this name brand...
